aventuras_patagonia.title: Aventuras en la Patagonia
bullets: Family-run horseback riding activity, occasionally I've helped with administrative tasks, performing tour guide and English-Spanish translation services

cim_glass.title: CIM Glass
bullets: Took requirements, understanding the workflow and needs of the client
Developed a web application to manage sales, rentals and maintenance of chemical toilets and related products

municipality.title: Municipality of Punta Arenas
bullets: Took requirements and designed a mockup for an internal project focused on taking requests for repairs of municipal assets and properties
Assisted in gathering requirements for Municipal Tourism Systems and Intranet
Acquired practical knowledge in the process of preparing public tenders

sernapesca.title: Sernapesca
bullets: Handled and resolved tickets/incidents using OsTickets
Developed web modules for “Mi Caleta”, updating dependencies, fixing errors and bugs, as well as testing new features
Wrote a remote connection guide using Fortinet for Linux and Windows users
Participated in Daily Scrums and work meetings with suppliers

learning.name: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Constant disposition to incorporate new technologies according to the project requirements

team.name: Teamwork
team.description: Experience collaborating in diverse teams, with focus on communication, cooperation and achievement of objectives

proactive.name: Proactivity
proactive.description: Initiative to detect and advance tasks independently, contributing without constant supervision

resilence.name: Resilience
resilence.description: Capacity to maintain focus and motivation in the face of technical obstacles or unexpected changes

kindness.name: Kindness
kindness.description: Respectful and positive attitude in dealing with colleagues, users and supervisors

empathy.name: Empathy
empathy.description: Capacity to understand and consider the points of view of others, facilitating effective communication and collaboration
